channel.title: Player color [read in] delta
channel.description: so when you scroll over anything, a furnace, a person, etc, you see the typing in the top left corner. so let's say you're cb 120 and you scroll over a 126, the name and cb lvl would be in a reddish color, and if they were cb lvl 80 then it would be green like good grass :p. how could i change the colors for these scroll overs of people? i dont know how to post pictures so this was as good as i could explain it. thanks in advance.

Ix Soulcist xI:

I’m going to be honest and say I’m not sure about this one. Though I would have to say that this is server sided in Client.Java assuming this has been around far longer than a Client has been made.

yeah i wasnt sure if you could but if you could it would be pretty awesome let’s see if anybody else knows. it could be editted, it could not, but its worth asking others.
